output_list.description: The transfer function does not check if the recipient's balance will overflow after the transfer. This can lead to a loss of funds for the recipient.
The transferFrom function does not check if the recipient's balance will overflow after the transfer. This can lead to a loss of funds for the recipient.
The mintToken function does not check if the total supply will overflow after the minting. This can lead to a loss of funds for the contract owner.
The freezeAccount function is only accessible to the contract owner. This can be exploited by malicious actors to freeze accounts without the owner's permission.
The constructor of the PolyAi contract has a typo in the variable name 'initialSupply'. This can lead to unexpected behavior and potential security vulnerabilities.
